lyrics.lyric: Beautiful Things
lyrics.tlyric: 世间美好

lyrics.lyric: For a while there it was rough
lyrics.tlyric: 曾经彷徨的岁月 举步维艰

lyrics.lyric: But lately, I've been doin' better
lyrics.tlyric: 而近来 我渐入佳境

lyrics.lyric: Than the last four cold Decembers I recall
lyrics.tlyric: 不再像记忆中这四年来的十二月那般寒冬凛冽

lyrics.lyric: And I see my family every month
lyrics.tlyric: 每个月都能与家人相见

lyrics.lyric: I found a girl my parents love
lyrics.tlyric: 我也觅得父母也交口称赞的另一半

lyrics.lyric: She'll come and stay the night, and I think I might have it all
lyrics.tlyric: 她会来我家过夜 此刻我好似拥有了全世界

lyrics.lyric: And I thank God every day
lyrics.tlyric: 我每天都虔诚感谢上天

lyrics.lyric: For the girl he sent my way
lyrics.tlyric: 感谢他让这女孩走进我的生活

lyrics.lyric: But I know the things he gives me, he can take away
lyrics.tlyric: 但我深知 上天所给予的 亦能随时夺走

lyrics.lyric: And I hold you every night
lyrics.tlyric: 每个夜晚我都拥你入怀

lyrics.lyric: And that's a feeling I wanna get used to
lyrics.tlyric: 这是一种我渴望习以为常的情感

lyrics.lyric: But there's no man as terrified as the man who stands to lose you
lyrics.tlyric: 可世上患得患失到恐惧的人 莫过于注定要失去你的我

lyrics.lyric: Oh, I hope I don't lose you
lyrics.tlyric: 噢 但愿我不落得失去你的结局

lyrics.lyric: Mm
lyrics.tlyric: Mm

lyrics.lyric: Please stay
lyrics.tlyric: 请为我驻足

lyrics.lyric: I want you, I need you, oh God
lyrics.tlyric: 我渴望你的存在 我也离不开你 噢 天呐

lyrics.lyric: Don't take
lyrics.tlyric: 别残忍剥夺

lyrics.lyric: Thеse beautiful things that I've got
lyrics.tlyric: 我拥有的些许世间美好

lyrics.lyric: Please stay
lyrics.tlyric: 请为我驻足

lyrics.lyric: I want you, I need you, oh God
lyrics.tlyric: 我渴望你的存在 我也离不开你 噢 天呐

lyrics.lyric: Don't take
lyrics.tlyric: 别残忍剥夺

lyrics.lyric: These beautiful things that I've got
lyrics.tlyric: 我拥有的些许世间美好

lyrics.lyric: Oh-oh-oh-oh, oh, oh, please
lyrics.tlyric: Oh-oh-oh-oh, oh, oh 拜托你

lyrics.lyric: Please don't take
lyrics.tlyric: 请别残忍剥夺

lyrics.lyric: I found my mind, I'm feelin' sane
lyrics.tlyric: 我找回了心智 重新拾回理智

lyrics.lyric: It's been a while, but I'm finding my faith
lyrics.tlyric: 虽已时隔甚久 但我正在找回心中的信仰

lyrics.lyric: If everything's good and it's great, why do I sit and wait 'til it's gone?
lyrics.tlyric: 若是一切安好 甚至十分融洽 为何我坐立不安 等待命运的宣判？

lyrics.lyric: Oh, I'll tell ya, I know I've got enough
lyrics.tlyric: 噢 我会告诉你 我已经知足了

lyrics.lyric: I've got peace and I've got love
lyrics.tlyric: 我有了平和的心 我得到了爱的眷顾

lyrics.lyric: But I'm up at night thinkin' I just might lose it all
lyrics.tlyric: 可夜深人静时 我依旧辗转难眠 唯恐会失去一切

lyrics.lyric: Please stay
lyrics.tlyric: 请为我驻足

lyrics.lyric: I want you, I need you, oh God
lyrics.tlyric: 我渴望你的存在 我也离不开你 噢 天呐

lyrics.lyric: Don't take
lyrics.tlyric: 别残忍剥夺

lyrics.lyric: These beautiful things that I've got
lyrics.tlyric: 我拥有的些许世间美好

lyrics.lyric: Oh-oh-oh-oh, oh, oh, please
lyrics.tlyric: Oh-oh-oh-oh, oh, oh 拜托你

lyrics.lyric: Please stay
lyrics.tlyric: 请为我驻足

lyrics.lyric: I want you, I need you, oh God
lyrics.tlyric: 我渴望你的存在 我也离不开你 噢 天呐

lyrics.lyric: I need
lyrics.tlyric: 我是多么需要

lyrics.lyric: These beautiful things that I've got
lyrics.tlyric: 自己仅有的些许世间美好

lrc.lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Benson Boone/Jackson Lafrantz Larsen/Evan Blair
[00:01.000] 作曲 : Benson Boone/Jackson Lafrantz Larsen/Evan Blair
[00:06.524] For a while there it was rough
[00:09.467] But lately, I've been doin' better
[00:13.318] Than the last four cold Decembers I recall
[00:20.215] And I see my family every month
[00:23.483] I found a girl my parents love
[00:27.143] She'll come and stay the night, and I think I might have it all
[00:34.011] And I thank God every day
[00:37.515] For the girl he sent my way
[00:40.668] But I know the things he gives me, he can take away
[00:47.438] And I hold you every night
[00:50.921] And that's a feeling I wanna get used to
[00:55.973] But there's no man as terrified as the man who stands to lose you
[01:03.713]
[01:07.223] Oh, I hope I don't losе you
[01:11.513] Mm
[01:13.206] Please stay
[01:16.957] I want you, I need you, oh God
[01:19.956] Don't take
[01:23.988] Thеse beautiful things that I've got
[01:25.892]
[01:26.840] Please stay
[01:30.825] I want you, I need you, oh God
[01:33.632] Don't take
[01:37.550] These beautiful things that I've got
[01:39.606]
[01:40.552] Oh-oh-oh-oh, oh, oh, please
[01:47.528] Please don't take
[01:51.076]
[01:52.420] I found my mind, I'm feelin' sane
[01:55.767] It's been a while, but I'm finding my faith
[01:59.174] If everything's good and it's great, why do I sit and wait 'til it's gone?
[02:05.884] Oh, I'll tell ya, I know I've got enough
[02:09.471] I've got peace and I've got love
[02:13.348] But I'm up at night thinkin' I just might lose it all
[02:17.462]
[02:21.630] Please stay
[02:25.629] I want you, I need you, oh God
[02:28.589] Don't take
[02:32.645] These beautiful things that I've got
[02:34.645]
[02:35.340] Oh-oh-oh-oh, oh, oh, please
[02:40.551]
[02:42.455] Please stay
[02:45.679] I want you, I need you, oh God
[02:49.020] I need
[02:52.781] These beautiful things that I've got

tlyric.lyric:
[by:人类迷惑行为__]
[00:06.524]曾经彷徨的岁月 举步维艰
[00:09.467]而近来 我渐入佳境
[00:13.318]不再像记忆中这四年来的腊月那般寒冬凛冽
[00:20.215]每个月都能与家人相见
[00:23.483]我也觅得父母也交口称赞的另一半
[00:27.143]她会来我家过夜 此刻我好似拥有了全世界
[00:34.011]我每天都虔诚感谢上天
[00:37.515]多亏祂派来的我的命中注定
[00:40.668]但我深知 上天所给予的 亦能随时夺走
[00:47.438]每个夜晚我都拥你入怀
[00:50.921]这是一种我渴望习以为常的情感
[00:55.973]可世上患得患失到恐惧的人 莫过于注定要失去你的我
[01:03.713]
[01:07.223]噢 但愿我不落得失去你的结局
[01:11.513]Mm
[01:13.206]请为我驻足
[01:16.957]我渴望你的存在 我也离不开你 噢 天呐
[01:19.956]别残忍剥夺
[01:23.988]我仅有的些许世间美好
[01:25.892]
[01:26.840]请为我驻足
[01:30.825]我渴望你的存在 我也离不开你 噢 天呐
[01:33.632]别残忍剥夺
[01:37.550]我仅有的些许世间美好
[01:39.606]
[01:40.552]Oh-oh-oh-oh, oh, oh 拜托你
[01:47.528]请别残忍剥夺
[01:51.076]
[01:52.420]我找回了心智 重新拾回理智
[01:55.767]虽已时隔甚久 但我正在找回心中的信仰
[01:59.174]若是一切安好 甚至十分融洽 为何我坐立不安 等待命运的宣判？
[02:05.884]噢 我会告诉你 我已经知足了
[02:09.471]我有了平和的心 我得到了爱的眷顾
[02:13.348]可夜深人静时 我依旧辗转难眠 唯恐会失去一切

[02:34.645]
[02:35.340]Oh-oh-oh-oh, oh, oh 拜托你
